alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Iron; Madison; Reynolds; St. Francois; Ste. Genevieve; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 13 at 1:53PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Illinois, including the following area, Randolph IL. Portions of Missouri, including the following areas, Crawford MO, Iron MO, Madison MO, Reynolds MO, Saint Francois MO, Sainte Genevieve MO and Washington MO. * WHEN...From 10 PM CDT this evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms will likely produce heavy rainfall late this evening into the overnight hours. One to three inches will be likely with locally higher amounts.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Iron; Madison; Reynolds; St. Francois; Ste. Genevieve; Washington
